sentence.Network_en: Now he was toto wait until morning and get the mortician to bring him a ladder.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在,他不得不等到天亮了,然后让墓地的工作人员给他拿个梯子来.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Latin mors, mort- 'death' + -ician

entry.def: A mortician is a person whose job is to deal with the bodies of people who have died and to arrange funerals.

means.word_mean: 1. one whose business is the management of funerals
